commands.resurser: ./r - Display a list of useful resources.
commands.Git Repository: ./git - Provide the link to the bot's GitHub repository.
commands.About: ./about - Information about the bot and its purpose.
commands.Ticket: ./ticket [name] - Create a new channel for discussing a specific issue. Use ./close to close this channel.
commands.Game Menu: ./spel - Choose between different games (Subnet and Network Questions).
commands.Ping: ./ping [IP_ADDRESS] - Perform a ping test to the specified IP address.
commands.RFC: ./rfc [NUMBER] - Retrieve information about the specified RFC number.
commands.BGP Setup: ./BGP-Setup [IP_ADDRESS] [AS_NUMBER] - Configure BGP peering with the given IP address and AS number.
commands.Add Role: ./addrole - Assign a predefined role to the user.
commands.Remove Role: ./removerole - Remove a predefined role from the user.
commands.Kick: ./kick [username] - Kick a user from the server. (Privilege 10/15 only)
commands.Ban: ./ban [username] - Ban a user from the server. (Privilege 10/15 only)
commands.Mute: ./mute [hours] [username] - Mute a user for a specified number of hours. (Privilege 10/15 only)
commands.Reboot: ./Reboot - Perform a git pull and restart the bot. (Bot-Admin only)
